sentences: Mike Ladd is an American hip hop musician from Boston, Massachusetts.
He is based in Paris, France.
Mike Ladd was born in Boston, Massachusetts.
As a child, he lived in India and Zimbabwe for a while.
Mike Ladd's debut studio album, Easy Listening 4 Armageddon, was released in 1997.
He released Welcome to the Afterfuture in 2000.
In 2005, he released Negrophilia: The Album, which was inspired by Petrine Archer-Straw's book of the same name.
In that year, he also released Father Divine on ROIR.
